long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
INTRODUCTION
Play Solitaire Game on your Google Chrome Browser with our simple & lightweight extension - No Internet required, no annoying ADS, and 100% Free!

HOW TO INSTALL?
1. Click "Add to Chrome" to install the extension
2. Pin the Solitaire Game extension icon to the Chrome toolbar
3. Click the Solitaire Game icon on the Chrome toolbar, the Solitaire Game popup will open. Tap on the popup or press "Spacebar" to start ;)
That's all you need to do! Have fun!

CONTACT
